root.hap.cluster

Class ClusterMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.mahout.math.VectorWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>
      • root.hap.cluster.ClusterMapper

  • public class ClusterMapper
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.mahout.math.VectorWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>

    Mapper class for extracting clusters.

    This mapper takes a set of columns from the final HAP algorithm matrix set and extracts the relevant information to be distributed among the ClusterReducers.

    Input key [Text]: information about this column
    Input value [VectorWritable]: the corresponding column

    Output key [Text]: tab separated list: {Row Number, Level}
    Output value [Text]: tab separated list: {Column Number, Level, Matrix ID, Element Value}

    Since:
    2013.06.25
    Author:
    Dillon Rose, Michel Rouly
    See Also:
    HierarchicalClusterDriver, ClusterReducer
